title: Are we getting summer LCS icons or am I spending 5200 IP to 2X transfer to and from NA to buy them?
body: What to do. 2X transfer to buy the LCS summoner icons? Or hope that OCE gets more than just OCE teams (I bought Avant Garde already).

replies.body: I'd say this is more a regional sales concern than a technical issue. You might want to head over to the [Miscellaneous](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) boards for this.
